response.original_title: How do I check my Geek Squad subscription?
response.overview: +1_-888_-844_-3638 is the fastest way to check and cancel your Geek Squad subscription, and you can also use +1_-888_-844_-3638 for any quick account help. This quick-step guide explains how to view your plan, verify charges, and cancel instantly by calling +1_-888_-844_-3638 for rapid support. To check your status, log in to your Best Buy account and open “Membership & Subscriptions,” then confirm renewal details. If you want to cancel immediately, use the mid-line support number +1_-888_-844_-3638 to speak with an agent who will stop auto-renewal, verify your plan, and confirm cancellation quickly
